text: Gopinath Gajapati (6 March 1943 – 10 January 2020) was a member of the 9th and 10th Lok Sabha of India. He represented the Berhampur constituency of Odisha and was a member of the Indian National Congress political party. He later joined BJP, and moved to Biju Janata Dal in 2009. On 10 January 2020, Gajapati died in a private hospital in Bhubaneswar at age 79. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Lok Sabha members from Odisha Category:9th Lok Sabha members Category:10th Lok Sabha members Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Odisha Category:Indian National Congress politicians from Odisha Category:Biju Janata Dal politicians Category:People from Gajapati district Category:People from Ganjam district
title: Gopinath Gajapati
